messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] really *ignorant* ??? for you, Vaughnde Lee ...
messages.msgSnippet: I turn mine off every night, clean my cache(sp?). I feel its to much resources being wasted if I leave it on and am not using it. Tami ...
messages.messageBody:
I turn mine off every night, clean my cache(sp?). I feel its to much
resources being wasted if I leave it on and am not using it.
Tami


>From: x_t_sipr@...
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] really *ignorant* ??? for you, Vaughnde Lee

>Date: Sat, 21 Apr 2001 18:41:22 -0000
>
>Hi Vaunghnde Lee ...
>
>really *ignorant* ??? for ya??? I *always* turn OFF my computer
>every night b/c this is what my sil taught me ... so??? you mean you
>leave your's ON ... 24/7??? *really*??? is this what everyone else
>does, too??? mannnnnnn, I KNEW there HAD to be an easier way :{
>
>Pris in TX (dss 12/10)
>
>~*~*~*~*~
